com.novell.ldapchai
Class AbstractChaiGroup

java.lang.Object
  com.novell.ldapchai.AbstractChaiEntry
      com.novell.ldapchai.AbstractChaiGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChaiEntry, ChaiGroup
public abstract class AbstractChaiGroup
extends AbstractChaiEntry
implements ChaiGroup

A complete implementation of ChaiGroup interface.

Clients looking to obtain a ChaiGroup instance should look to ChaiFactory.

Author:
Jason D. Rivard

Constructor Detail

AbstractChaiGroup

public AbstractChaiGroup(String groupDN,
                         ChaiProvider chaiProvider)
This construtor is used to instantiate an ChaiUserImpl instance representing an inetOrgPerson user object in ldap.

Parameters:
groupDN - The DN of the user
chaiProvider - Helper to connect to LDAP.
